description: '''Jaiva''', '''Township jive''' ('''TJ'''), ''' Soweto jive''', '''Soweto sound''' or '''Soweto beat''' is a [[Music genre|subgenre]] of South African township music and [[African dance]] form that influenced Western [[Breakdancing|breakdance]] and emerged from the [[shebeen]] culture of the apartheid-era [[Township (South Africa)|townships]].
